text: Matthew P. Roth (born September 15, 1964) is an American actor. He had a recurring role on Roseanne as Jackie's abusive boyfriend, Fisher, from 1992–1993. He joined the cast of Desperate Housewives in fall 2006 as new neighbor Art Shephard. ==Personal life== Roth began a relationship with his Roseanne co-star Laurie Metcalf. They have a son who was born in 1993 and a daughter who was born in 2005 via surrogate. They adopted a son after fostering him at the age of six in 2006. They eventually married, and have also worked together on occasion, as in the 1994 feature film thriller Blink, the 1998 drama Chicago Cab, and Desperate Housewives.Laurie Metcalf, Yahoo! Movies, accessed June 29, 2011. In September 2011, Roth filed for divorce citing irreconcilable differences. In May 2014, the divorce was finalized.
